subtitle.Text: Uh. So I got my ticket home from Europe.
I get back on June 6th, but it's a really late flight because that was the cheapest, so it gets in at midnight.
But don't worry, I'll get a shuttle home from the airport, so you don't have to come pick me up.
Like really, seriously, you don't have to.
Okay, so. Love you! See you soon. Bye!
